spoilage.configuration.title: Spoilage Configuration
spoilage.configuration.enabled.tooltip: Enable or disable the entire spoilage system
spoilage.configuration.globalSpeedMultip: Multiplier for spoilage speed. Higher values = faster spoilage.
spoilage.configuration.checkIntervalTick: How often to check spoilage. 20 ticks = 1 second.
spoilage.configuration.containerSpoilage: Spoilage rate multipliers per container (format: namespace:container;multiplier)
spoilage.configuration.showRemainingTime: Display countdown until food fully spoils
spoilage.configuration.showFreshnessWord: Display freshness as text (Fresh, Stale, etc)
spoilage.configuration.showFreshnessPerc: Display freshness as a percentage value
spoilage.configuration.showTintOverlay.t: Apply color overlay to spoiling items
spoilage.configuration.tintStyleRotten.t: Use decay colors (green/brown) instead of warning colors (yellow/red)
spoilage.configuration.useTextureBlendin: Blend between fresh and spoiled textures based on spoilage level
spoilage.configuration.blendStartThresho: Spoilage percentage when texture blending begins (0.0-1.0)
spoilage.configuration.blendFullThreshol: Spoilage percentage when spoiled texture is fully visible (0.0-1.0)
spoilage.configuration.yLevelPreservatio: Enable slower spoilage at lower Y levels (underground)
spoilage.configuration.biomeTemperatureP: Cold biomes slow spoilage, hot biomes speed it up
spoilage.configuration.coldSweatIntegrat: Use Cold Sweat mod temperatures if available
spoilage.configuration.yLevel.tooltip: Configure Y-level based preservation thresholds and multipliers
spoilage.configuration.yLevelSurface.too: Y coordinate at which preservation stops
spoilage.configuration.yLevelDeepMultipl: Spoilage speed at deep level (0.6 = 40% slower)
spoilage.configuration.biome.tooltip: Configure biome temperature based preservation thresholds and multipliers
spoilage.configuration.biomeColdThreshol: Biome temps below this get cold preservation bonus
spoilage.configuration.biomeHotThreshold: Biome temps above this get hot spoilage penalty
spoilage.configuration.biomeColdMultipli: Spoilage speed in coldest biomes (0.7 = 30% slower)
spoilage.configuration.biomeHotMultiplie: Spoilage speed in hottest biomes (1.3 = 30% faster)
spoilage.configuration.offhandAutoCombin: Automatically merge picked up food with same food in offhand
spoilage.configuration.villagersIgnoreSp: Villagers won't pick up or use spoiled food
spoilage.configuration.animalsPoisonedBy: Animals get poisoned when fed rotten food
spoilage.configuration.preventPlantingSp: Cannot plant spoiled seeds or saplings
spoilage.configuration.lootRandomization: Each item in loot tables gets separate random freshness
spoilage.configuration.contaminationEnab: Rotten food accelerates spoilage of nearby fresh food in the same inventory
spoilage.configuration.contaminationMult: Speed increase per rotten slot (0.15 = +15% faster per slot)
spoilage.configuration.contaminationMaxM: Maximum spoilage speed multiplier from food contamination
spoilage.configuration.crops.tooltip: Configure crop lifecycle and rot mechanics
spoilage.configuration.cropFreshPeriodTi: How long fully grown crops stay 100% fresh before rotting
spoilage.configuration.cropRotPeriodTick: How long crops take to fully rot after fresh period expires
spoilage.configuration.cropMinimumHarves: Crops at or below this growth stage are inedible when harvested
spoilage.configuration.bonemealResetsRot: Using bonemeal on rotting crops restarts their fresh period
spoilage.configuration.bonemealBlockedOn: Bone meal has no effect on crops that are currently rotting
